articles.author: Ahmad Ghaddar, Alex Lawler, Maha Dahan
articles.title: OPEC+ extends oil cuts to third quarter, discusses 2025, sources say - Reuters
articles.description: OPEC+ agreed on Sunday to prolong its deep oil output cuts in 2024 and was discussing extending them into 2025, OPEC+ sources said as the group seeks to shore up the market amid tepid global demand growth, high interest rates and rising rival U.S. production.

articles.title: Ethereum price prediction: Why a move to $4K may take time - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Ethereum’s key indicators confirmed that its price has consolidated within a range since 20th May.

articles.title: Anglo chief admits selling De Beers is biggest challenge - Financial Times
